Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What do you think of the events after 
Beast Machine? 

  o It's all black and white, good vs evil 
  o Not everyone is so good anymore... 
  o Transformers will finally all get along 
  o A new foe appears 
  o BM sucked and Azure's a dumbass 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1147944  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
